00035 #ifndef _oscillator_h
00036 #define _oscillator_h
00037 
00038 #include <fromsys.h>
00039 #include <datatypes.h>
00040 #include <bufvec.h>
00041 #include <cxops.h>
00042 
00043 #define ComplexTone 1
00044 #define RealTone 0
00045 
00046 typedef int OscType;
00047 
00048 typedef struct _oscillator
00049 {
00050     int size;
00051     void *signalpoints;
00052     double Phase;
00053     double Frequency;
00054     OscType OscillatorType;
00055 } oscillator, *OSC;
00056 
00057 #define OSCbase(p)     ((p)->signalpoints)
00058 #define OSCCbase(p)    (CXBbase((CXB)((p)->signalpoints)))
00059 #define OSCCdata(p, i) (CXBbase((CXB)((p)->signalpoints))[(i)])
00060 #define OSCreal(p, i)  (CXBbase((CXB)((p)->signalpoints))[(i)].re)
00061 #define OSCimag(p, i)  (CXBbase((CXB)((p)->signalpoints))[(i)].im)
00062 
00063 #define OSCRbase(p)    (RLBbase((RLB)((p)->signalpoints)))
00064 #define OSCRdata(p, i) (RLBbase((RLB)((p)->signalpoints))[(i)])
00065 
00066 #define OSCsize(p)     ((p)->size)
00067 #define OSCphase(p)    ((p)->Phase)
00068 #define OSCfreq(p)     ((p)->Frequency)
00069 #define OSCtype(p)     ((p)->OscillatorType)
00070 
00071 extern void ComplexOSC( OSC );
00072 extern void RealOSC( OSC );
00073 extern OSC newOSC( int size, OscType TypeOsc, double Frequency, double Phase,
00074                    REAL SampleRate, char *tag );
00075 extern void delOSC( OSC );
00076 extern void fixOSC( OSC p, double Frequency, double Phase, REAL SampleRate );
00077 
00078 #endif /*  */
